group_1.narration: It all started on one fateful day...

group_1.textRight: Welcome. Papa's right this way.
Hello, Kagome.

group_1.narration: I had been putting together a record of@the interviews I'd collected from Magical Girls.@Once I'd gotten a degree of structure in mind,@I decided to pay Professor Satomi a visit to@ask for his advice on the final compilation.

group_1.textRight: It has certainly been a while.@So, first off, about your composition...
...Ah, sorry, phone call. Who could it be?
Do you mind if I take this call?

group_1.textLeft: It's no problem at all...! Go ahead.

group_1.textRight: Excuse me, then...
Hello? What's up?@Is this about "the case"?
Yes... Right...
...Someone posted about it again...?@Oh, bother...
Understood... That being said, I have a guest@at the moment.
I'll call you back later, though...@We can discuss the matter then.
...Anyway, sorry about that.@Now, where were we...?
Ah, yes... So, the structure is...
...Mm... You know...
...It would be better to talk to the youths about@this sort of thing...

group_1.textLeft: Talk...? What do you mean by that?

group_1.textRight: No, my apologies, that came out of nowhere.
Actually, it's about the phone call I just took...
The person on the other end was an old high@school classmate of mine... His name's Kayano.
He went back to his hometown and took over@his family's inn.
But something has been troubling him recently,@so he asked me for advice...
The subject in question is...@Hmm, how do I phrase this...
Stories have been proving to be...an issue@for him.

group_1.textLeft: Like the number of floors...? Does he have@trouble going up and down stairs?

group_1.textRight: No, not like stories in a building.@I mean the "scary ghost story" variety.
Yes...
The area is steeped in legends of spirits@and youkai.
For some reason, that's been spreading around@online lately,
and his inn has seen a drastic increase@in the number of tourists.

group_1.textLeft: ...But wouldn't that be a good thing for him?

group_1.textRight: That is technically true, but the quality@of the guests is, well...
Some of them keep taking videos...@Which is a real nuisance, to put it one way...
And some customers have caused a racket while@testing their courage in the dead of night.
Those types are the majority of the patrons@he gets these days.
As you can imagine, he's been getting very@fed up with it...
Since those are the kinds of problems he's@been dealing with,
I thought young people might be able to offer@more insight.
I'm going to consult Nayuta and her friends@later, but...
Could I ask for your opinion first, Kagome?

group_1.textLeft: Ah, sure, if you're okay with me...

group_1.textRight: Wonderful!

group_1.narration: ...And so, in a strange turn of events,@a discussion was sparked between the@Professor and I, with the aim of solving@a disturbance in a certain town...
But before I knew it, I was...

group_1.textLeft: Would you like me to investigate?

group_1.textRight: Come again?!

group_1.narration: I found my hand on a mysterious door@to something I had never experienced...
